name: Absorbing Tattoo
description: This tattoo incorporates designs that emphasize one color. While the tattoo is on your skin, you have Resistance to a type of damage associated with that color (see table). When you take damage of that type, you can take a Reaction to gain Immunity to that instance of the damage, and you regain a number of Hit Points equal to half the damage you would have taken. Once this Reaction is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

effects.name: Damage Resistance
effects.description: Resistance to the chosen damage type.

effects.name: Damage Absorption
effects.description: As a Reaction, gain Immunity to one instance of the damage type and regain HP equal to half the damage.
